name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mist: The way to be mindful for busy people.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Drop the cluttered meditation apps that never get opened. Mist lets you actually be more mindful without the hassle.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feel your best with Mist for Chrome

By installing the extension, you agree to Mist's Terms and Conditions (www.usemist.com/tos) and acknowledge that you have read Mist's Privacy Policy (www.usemist.com/privacy).

From meditation to relaxing sounds, Mist helps you relax and become more mindful. You'll improve your focus and be more productive. Mist is an app that helps you practice mindfulness without fully detaching from your work. you don't have to switch to different apps or websites, it's all from the comfort of your browser. Be sure to register your account and start being more mindful and productive.

⦵ Relax
You can now relax from the comfort of your browser. Mist offers a variety of meditations to reduce anxiety, increase self-awareness, focus on the present or get a quick rejuvenating relaxation. Also, Mist has sounds of nature to make you feel grounded and closer to nature, while also being in your home or office.

⦵ Focus
Focus on your work and ultimately be more productive without fully detaching from your work. Mist offers LoFi Music which can improve focus and filter out any potential distraction, getting you in the flow state. Also, the sounds of nature can be used as a great background/white noise when you're working from home or from your office.

⦵ Be More Productive
Mindfulness can improve productivity in a variety of ways. Using Mist's guided meditations, you can make yourself fresh and ready to work. However, high levels of anxiety can decrease your productivity dramatically, that's why Mist offers an anxiety meditation program.

⦵ Mist Premium
Mist offers a premium package, which gives you access to premium features. Unlock the full Mist experience and gain exclusive benefits. 

⦵Be more mindful
Mindfulness has never been easier with Mist's Body Scan Meditation helps you relax and focus on yourself, while also increasing self-awareness, reducing negative emotions and focusing on the present. If you want something quicker, Mist has the 2-Minute Meditation to get a quick and rejuvenating jolt of relaxation.

⦵ Sounds of Nature
Get closer to nature without ever leaving your browser. Mist offers a stream of the sounds of the forest. Birds singing, trees cracking, squirrels chattering and the wind whistling. It's amazing! Also, Mist offers a stream of the sounds of the ocean. The soothing sound of the waves hitting the shore...
